Configure Serilog Sub-loggers using XML AppSettings

31 Aug 2020 - 3 minute read

Serilog has a neat feature that allows you to configure sub-loggers. With this feature you can essentially have log specific instances running on your application. I recently had to configure a .NET Framework application to use two different sub-loggers and while I was able find many examples online on how... Continue reading...
